sentences.english: With 2 year working experience, I have full confidence to face to any challenge.
sentences.chinese: 两年的实战经验让我有信心接受各种挑战。

sentences.english: The teaching of using Elven Magic Missle in battle.
sentences.chinese: 在实战中使用魔箭迫击的示范。

sentences.english: The basic techniques concerned with passing, taking a pass and dribbling are the weakness in the real games.
sentences.chinese: 传接球和运球基本技术在实战运用中是薄弱环节。

sentences.english: Practice skillfully and there are benefits to improve the ability of the actual combat.
sentences.chinese: 习之纯熟，对于演练实战技能，颇有益处。

sentences.english: He earned his stripes through his practical experience in the actual market.
sentences.chinese: 他通过在市场上的实战经历赢得现在的声誉。

sentences.english: 'If they started to fight for real they could really damage each other, ' said Ewa.
sentences.chinese: 如果它们的实战正式上演的话，将会伤害到彼此。

sentences.english: Sandor spoke directly to practicing, winning, and never giving up.
sentences.chinese: 桑德尔直接谈到了实战，赚钱，永远不放弃。
持续改善实战经验和冲动。

sentences.english: Might war games deserve a greater role in business?
sentences.chinese: 实战演习是否能够在商业中占有一席之地呢？

sentences.english: Combat will have to rely on their own practice, will reach the hands than the eye.
sentences.chinese: 实战都要靠自己的不断练习，才会达到手比眼快。

sentences.english: Some bots have been defusing bombs for years, but none have seen combat.
sentences.chinese: 一些长年用于拆弹的机器人却一直未见用于实战。

sentences.english: The complex logistical preparations will serve as a dry run for future efforts.
sentences.chinese: 综合的后勤准备会是未来实战的预演。

sentences.english: In the end, you have a perfect example of progressive enhancement in action.
sentences.chinese: 最后，你拥有了一个渐进增强实战的完美例子。

sentences.english: The teaching of using assault to close near a monster in battle.
sentences.chinese: 在实战中使用突击走位零射的示范。

sentences.english: This year I took the preparation seriously and regarded every simulation exam as the real one, " he says."
sentences.chinese: 今年我认真备考，把每次模拟考试都当做实战来对待。

sentences.english: The training of policing skill under battle conditions is an important approach to promote the battle effectiveness of the police.
sentences.chinese: 警务实战技能训练是提高公安民警战斗力的重要途径。

definition: practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to plan a military mission on a sand table (idiom)/to rehearse a planned action or activity/to conduct a dry run
